scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); console.log('dist:'); fs.readdirSync('./dist').forEach(f => console.log(f)); console.log('dist/tools:'); fs.readdirSync('./dist/tools').forEach(f => console.log(f)); console.log('Imports in dist/server.js:'); fs.readFileSync('./dist/server.js', 'utf8').split('\n').forEach((line, i) => { if (line.includes(`from './tools/`)) console.log(`${i+1}: ${line}`); });"
